meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #881.

td.p: Mark Meyerson, a music producer and consultant from North Hollywood, California
Margaret Bellisario, a technical writer from Dallas, Texas
Michael Rankins, a customer service represenative from Rohnert Park, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $11,399)

tr.td: PHYSICAL SCIENCE
RELIGION
STARTS WITH "V"
ACTRESSES
WILLIE NELSON
WWI PLANES
